heading: HR01612
0: A RESOLUTION STRONGLY URGING PRESIDENT RODRIGO R. DUTERTE TO PROVIDE BOTH HOUSES OF CONGRESS A FULL DISCLOSURE OF THE LOAN CONDITIONS FOR ALL PROJECTS UNDER THE "BUILD! BUILD! BUILD!" IN ORDER TO PROMOTE TRANSPARENCY AND AFFORD BOTH HOUSES OF CONGRESS TO CONDUCT A REVIEW AND ASSESS THE POSSIBLE IMPACTS OF SUCH LOANS TO OUR DEBT-SERVICING CAPACITY AND NATIONAL ECONOMY
status: Pending with the Committee on PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS since 2018-01-24
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01612
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION STRONGLY URGING PRESIDENT RODRIGO R. DUTERTE TO PROVIDE BOTH HOUSES OF CONGRESS A FULL DISCLOSURE OF THE LOAN CONDITIONS FOR ALL PROJECTS UNDER THE "BUILD! BUILD! BUILD!" IN ORDER TO PROMOTE TRANSPARENCY AND AFFORD BOTH HOUSES OF CONGRESS TO CONDUCT A REVIEW AND ASSESS THE POSSIBLE IMPACTS OF SUCH LOANS TO OUR DEBT-SERVICING CAPACITY AND NATIONAL ECONOMY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-01-24
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS ON 2018-01-24
